## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1be5313ebc025cf120f74736aba05ea6e53d94fb39c36b1097c2803a7f7d70de)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'payment-react-component' @ 1.5.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
